item.title: NCP疫情最新动态
item.description: 最新疫情动态 .container{ height: 100px; width: 550px; border:10px; margin: 40px; } .container .label{ float: left; width: 33%; height: 100px; text-align: center; line-height: 100px; } 累计确诊 死亡 治愈 *lastUpdateTime: var data={ msg: "NCP疫情最新动态", confirm:'', confirmAdd:'', nowConfirm:'', dead:'', heal:'', lastUpdateTime:'' } var vm = new Vue({ el:"#NCP", data: data, methods:{}, }); axios
